title: gotest does not recognise GOPATH
body:
When using GOPATH, gotest won't work.

The attached tar archive gives an example.

% pwd
/Users/rog/src
% tar xzf gotest.tgz
% GOPATH=$GOROOT:/Users/rog/src/gotest
% export GOPATH
% cd gotest/src/foo.com
% goinstall .
% cd ../bar.com
% goinstall .
% gotest
rm -f _test/bar.com.a
6g  -o _gotest_.6 bar.go  bar_test.go
bar.go:2: can't find import: foo.com
make: *** [_gotest_.6] Error 1
gotest: "/Users/rog/bin/gomake testpackage GOTESTFILES=bar_test.go" failed:
exit status 2
%
Attachments: 1. gotest.tgz (512 bytes)
